title: Nike Clone
description: A responsive nike landing page built with React and Tailwind CSS, following a JavaScript Mastery walkthrough. Features dynamic UI, smooth animations, and modern design.

title: Clash Royale Stats Generator
description: A web app that fetches and displays player stats and chest cycle data from Clash Royale using a valid player tag. Built with Node.js and the axios package for efficient API integration and real-time data display.

title: CleckCart
description: An e-commerce platform where traders can apply to sell their goods, with each trader being unique. Customers can shop from a variety of items. Developed as part of a university team project with 6 members, this project involved real-world processes including documentation, meetings, and contracts, simulating a full project lifecycle.

title: Notefy
description: Notefy is a collaborative note-taking app built with the MERN stack and Web Speech API, allowing users to create, edit, and share notes via text or voice. It features user authentication for secure access and a responsive design for seamless individual or team use.

title: Java Turtle GUI
description: A project built using Java's Turtle GUI for my undergraduate assessment. The project involved utilizing a provided JAR file, with the remaining code written in Eclipse IDE to create an interactive graphical interface.
